title: Spicy Cabbage and Red Onion Slaw
ingredients: Handful fresh mint and cilantro leaves, minced
1tablespoon (15ml) juice from 1 lime, plus more to taste
directions: 1. In a large bowl, combine cabbage, onion, herbs, chilies, and lime juice. Season with a big pinch of salt and massage to soften slightly. Taste and season with more salt or lime juice to taste. Serve immediately.
